org.ensembl.driver
Interface ExonAdaptor

All Superinterfaces:
Adaptor, FeatureAdaptor, java.rmi.Remote
public interface ExonAdaptor
extends FeatureAdaptor

Provides access to Exons in the datasource.

See Also:
Exon

          Name of the default ExonAdaptor available from a driver.

fetchComplete

public Exon fetchComplete(Exon exon)
                   throws AdaptorException
This method loads the gene and transcripts into the exon if it corresponds to entries in the database.

Parameters:
exon - potentially incomplete exon.
Returns:
exon with gene and transcripts loaded, or null if no such entries where found.
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetchAllByTranscript

public java.util.List fetchAllByTranscript(long transcriptID)
                                    throws AdaptorException
Fetch all exons associated with the transcript.

Parameters:

Returns:
zero or more Exons.
Throws:
AdaptorException
